attributes.action: abolish the drink driving limit. change it so you can NOT drink at all while driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there has been so many people injured and killed because of drunk drivers. i dont believe in the 'limit' i think you should not be able to drink anything if you are going to be driving. anyone found to do so, should be banned from driving for life.
